data.eml:eml: Revision of fossil species of Dryinus belonging to constans group, with description of a new species (Hymenoptera: Dryinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Olmi, Massimo, Guglielmino, Adalgisa, Vollaro, Massimo (2011): Revision of fossil species of Dryinus belonging to constans group, with description of a new species (Hymenoptera: Dryinidae). Zootaxa 2981: 43-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.278335
